```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE) ## keep this, add other settings if needed
```

# load packages

```{r}
library(terra)
library(d6geodata)
```


use `{d6geodata}` package

```{r install}
temp <- d6geodata::temp_ras(1000)
values(temp) <- 1

plot(temp)
```

make a multiple/expand for eurogrid

```{r, preview=FALSE}
ncell(terra::extend(x = temp, 
                    y = 100,
                    fill = 2))


temp_exp <- terra::extend(x = temp, 
                    y = 100,
                    fill = 2)

```

rasterize

```{r plot}
d6geodata::plot_qualitative_map(temp_exp)
```

Please knit the whole document in the end, to test if it is working!
